summary: The Golden Age Act of 2025 (H.R. 1790) proposes to mandate the inclusion of a portrait of Donald J. Trump on the front of all $100 notes printed after December 31, 2028. The Secretary of Treasury is required to release the preliminary design of the new $100 note by December 31, 2026. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 3, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Financial Services.
